title: A Secret Love
synopsis: Amid shifting times, two women kept their decades-long love a secret. But coming out later in life comes with its own set of challenges.

title: Murder to Mercy: The Cyntoia Brown Story
synopsis: After 16-year-old Cyntoia Brown is sentenced to life in prison, questions about her past, physiology and the law itself call her guilt into question.

title: Love Is War
synopsis: An adoring couple elects to test the strength of their marriage when they run against each other for the office of state governor.

title: The Reliant
synopsis: When a town suffers an economic collapse, social unrest forces a family to seek refuge in the wilderness as bitter outlaws threaten their survival.

title: Love Aaj Kal
synopsis: When professional ambitions clash with personal feelings for a modern-day couple, a love story from a bygone decade may offer some wisdom.

title: 5Gang
synopsis: To keep the band together, Selly tries to earn money by making an appearance at the birthday party of a mobster's daughter — until he gets kidnapped.

title: The Lift Boy
synopsis: When a lazy young man replaces his father as the elevator operator of a posh residential complex, what he sees as menial work soon takes on new meaning.

title: No Direction Home: Bob Dylan
synopsis: Featuring rare concert footage and interviews with legendary musicians, this documentary traces Bob Dylan's life story and extraordinary career.

title: Bheeshma
synopsis: Tired of being single, a smart-aleck meme creator has a chance to prove himself to the girl he loves when he is suddenly appointed CEO of her workplace.

title: Yours Sincerely, Kanan Gill
synopsis: Revisiting life goals set in a letter written as a teen to his future self, comedian Kanan Gill reports back on if he's lived up to his own expectations.

title: Extraction
synopsis: A hardened mercenary's mission becomes a soul-searching race to survive when he's sent into Bangladesh to rescue a drug lord's kidnapped son.

title: Kolaiyuthir Kaalam
synopsis: The speech-and-hearing-impaired heiress of a palatial mansion must rely on basic instincts when a masked invader is determined to kill her.

title: Time to Hunt
synopsis: Wanting to leave their dystopian world behind for a faraway paradise, three outlaws plot a money heist — and draw the attention of a vicious killer.

title: This Earth of Mankind
synopsis: A Javanese royal and half-Dutch woman fall in love as Indonesia rises to independence from colonial rule. Based on Pramoedya Ananta Toer's famed novel.

title: My Stupid Boss
synopsis: After moving to Kuala Lumpur, Diana lands a secretary job at an ironworks owned by her husband's old college friend, possibly the world's worst boss.

title: The Willoughbys
synopsis: Four siblings with horribly selfish parents hatch a plan to get rid of them for good and form a perfectly imperfect family of their own.

title: My Stupid Boss 2
synopsis: Having driven away many of his employees, Bossman and three of his long-suffering workers try to find cheap labor in Vietnam but find trouble instead.

title: The Silence of the Marsh
synopsis: While researching corruption for his new book, a successful crime novelist shades the line between fiction and reality.

title: Circus of Books
synopsis: For decades, a nice Jewish couple ran Circus of Books, a porn shop and epicenter for gay LA. Their director daughter documents their life and times.

title: The Set Up
synopsis: Manipulation and personal vendettas collide when a con artist hires a young woman to assist with his scheme to marry a wealthy heiress.

title: Varane Avashyamund
synopsis: At an apartment complex, the lives of a mother, a daughter seeking an arranged marriage, a military retiree and a young man become intertwined.

title: Sergio
synopsis: Passions, ideals and bitter realities collide as charismatic UN diplomat Sergio Vieira de Mello becomes trapped in a life-threatening situation in Iraq.

title: The Legacy of the Bones
synopsis: A year after solving a series of murders, detective Amaia is faced with a related mystery in the Baztán Valley that ends up hitting very close to home.

title: Earth and Blood
synopsis: A sawmill owner and his teenage daughter become tangled in a deadly feud when a drug dealer stashes stolen cocaine on their remote property.

title: Rising High
synopsis: Ready to do anything to get rich, a young man upends the Berlin property market with his shady pal, till the good times threaten to destroy it all.

title: أحمد حلمي - ليلى عز العرب - محمد فرج
synopsis: On his wedding day, an arrogant, greedy accountant experiences a series of calamities that keep replaying as he lives the same day over and over again.

title: Bittersweet
synopsis: After 20 years abroad, a photographer returns to his birth country of Egypt and gets stranded without identification in a now unfamiliar culture.

title: The Promise
synopsis: When his powerful crime czar boss kills the man he considered a mentor, a young gangster on the rise goes to war in order to get revenge.

title: Alelí
synopsis: Mourning their father's death, a dysfunctional trio of siblings must face selling their beloved childhood beach house — and dealing with each other.

title: Maurício Meirelles: Generating Chaos
synopsis: Comedian Maurício Meirelles explores his chaotic mind with scathingly funny views on family, prejudices, turtles and more in this stand-up special.

title: Sprinter
synopsis: When a Jamaican teen hopes to use track to reunite him with his mother in America, family dysfunction at home threatens to knock his plans off course.

title: For Love or Money
synopsis: Concierge Doug works at an upscale hotel. His dream of building his own luxury hotel finally seems to be coming true when he finds a potential investor. All Doug has to do is keep his friend happy -- which includes baby-sitting the man's mistress.

title: World Famous Lover
synopsis: When his frustrated girlfriend decides to leave him, a struggling writer gets down to work on stories of romance he hopes will win her back.

title: You Know Who
synopsis: After a botched escape attempt, a fugitive convict's brain is swapped with that of his prison warden with comically awkward results.

title: She Made Me a Criminal
synopsis: In order to get her trust fund money from her wealthy but miserly father, a woman enlists a naive young man to help fake her own kidnapping.

title: Mischief
synopsis: Mistaking the sleeping passenger on his train for a drunk, a young man posts a picture of him online, unaware of his impulsive act's ugly repercussions.

title: The International Player
synopsis: A footballer for a local club aspires to join the big leagues then gets his shot at going pro, fueling his team's rise to victory.

title: The Dealer
synopsis: Separated by distance and circumstance, two bitter rivals cross paths when the perils of the drug trade unexpectedly unite them.

title: فاصل ونعود
synopsis: While fighting a child custody battle against his father-in-law, a taxi driver loses his memory when his son is kidnapped.

title: Boushkash
synopsis: A former goalkeeper-turned-talent scout embarks on a mischievous adventure to recruit players for Egyptian football clubs.

title: Lembi 8 Giga
synopsis: To upgrade his life, a simple man fakes his credentials as a lawyer when sudden extraordinary abilities give him the talent to thrive.

title: LeapFrog: Letter Factory
synopsis: In this entertaining installment of the wildly popular early-learning series, Professor Quigley, Leap, Lily and Tad arrive at the magical Letter Factory, where jumbles of sounds are miraculously shaped into letters.

title: Fittest in Dubai
synopsis: Top athletes from around the globe test their fitness in a four-day competition at the first-ever CrossFit Sanctional event. Let the games begin.

title: LeapFrog: Sing-along, Read-along
synopsis: Using rhythm and rhymes, a funky band and a colorful cast of characters help make reading, sounding out vowels and building words easy and fun!

title: For the Broken Hearted
synopsis: In three interwoven stories, love ends up in limbo as romantic partners navigate bliss, loss, failures and feelings while trying to make happiness last.

title: Chris D'Elia: No Pain
synopsis: Chris D'Elia takes the stage in Minneapolis to offer his thoughts on everything from self-censorship to problematic dolphins to lame mutant powers.

title: A Champion Heart
synopsis: When a grieving teen must work off her debt to a ranch, she cares for a wounded horse that teaches her more about healing than she expected.

title: Surviving R. Kelly: The Impact
synopsis: From public protests to viral movements, the aftermath of the R. Kelly docuseries is explored in this special featuring journalists and experts.

title: Code 8
synopsis: In a city where super-powered people are ostracized, an earnest day laborer considers using his outlawed abilities for money to save his sick mother.

title: Tigertail
synopsis: A man reflects on the lost love of his youth and his long-ago journey from Taiwan to America as he begins to reconnect with his estranged daughter.

title: The Main Event
synopsis: Using special powers from a magical mask, a young WWE fan causes chaos when he enters a wrestling competition and fights an intimidating rival.

title: School Life
synopsis: In one of the poorest areas of Paris, a school counselor devotes herself to working with disadvantaged students, while facing challenges of her own.

title: LA Originals
synopsis: Photographer Estevan Oriol and artist Mister Cartoon turned their Chicano roots into gritty art, impacting street culture, hip hop and beyond.

title: Love Wedding Repeat
synopsis: Different versions of the same day unfold as Jack juggles difficult guests, unbridled chaos and potential romance at his sister's wedding.

title: Tiffany Haddish: She Ready! From the Hood To Hollywood!
synopsis: Comedic breakout Tiffany Haddish delivers a riotous stand-up ripe with the unpretentious and filthy tales of her meteoric rise to stardom.

title: Born Beautiful
synopsis: After her best friend dies, Barbs attempts to rediscover herself until love leaves her true identity — and heart — in question.

title: The Ghost Who Walks
synopsis: Desperate to meet his daughter, a convict cuts a deal by ratting out his old boss. Free and searching for his family, he must dodge a hit on his life.

title: Mine 9
synopsis: A methane explosion leaves a group of miners trapped two miles deep into the earth with a small oxygen supply and desperate for any means of survival.

title: Dark Light
synopsis: Implicated in her daughter's disappearance, a mother searches for answers when she returns to an old family home that may have an unwanted visitor.

title: Coffee and Kareem
synopsis: An inept Detroit cop must team up with his girlfriend's foul-mouthed young son when their first crack at bonding time uncovers a criminal conspiracy.

title: Money Heist: The Phenomenon
synopsis: A documentary on why and how 'Money Heist' sparked a wave of enthusiasm around the world for a lovable group of thieves and their professor.

title: David Batra: Elefanten i rummet
synopsis: Swedish comedian David Batra gets personal as he playfully details the perks and pitfalls of being married to a recently resigned political leader.

title: Babamın Ceketi
synopsis: Facing pressure to marry immediately, an unemployed man must find a way to pay for a wedding by any means necessary.

title: Sol Levante
synopsis: A young warrior and her familiar search for the sacred place said to fulfill wishes. It's best not to anger the ancient guardians and spirits.

title: Violet Evergarden: Eternity and the Auto Memory Doll
synopsis: A lonely young woman feels trapped at her all girls' school. But metal hands and heartfelt letters warm her heart when Violet becomes her tutor.

title: School Daze
synopsis: Explore the biases, anxiety and frustration of black students, and examine the social divide and interracial conflict that exist within black schools.

title: Indian Horse
synopsis: Stripped of his heritage at a residential school, an indigenous student finds refuge on the rink when he discovers a passion for hockey.

title: The Players Club
synopsis: Young single mother Diana struggles to provide for her child and pay for her college education. She ends up working at a shoe store, but meets two strippers from at a nearby gentlemen's club who convince her there's fast money to be made stripping.

title: Sunrise in Heaven
synopsis: A couple's epic love story faces a tragic twist of fate, putting their family ⁠— and faith ⁠— to a heartbreaking test. Based on true events.

title: Friendship
synopsis: Best friends since childhood, a righteous cop and a lawyer who represents criminals in court become rivals when they fall for the same woman.

title: Duniya
synopsis: A lawyer defends his childhood friend – and girlfriend's brother – in a murder case, unaware of his own deep connection to the attorney he’s up against.

title: Kapoor and Sons
synopsis: Returning home to visit their ill grandfather, two estranged brothers must confront their unresolved rivalry while their parents’ marriage frays.

title: Kaal
synopsis: Trapped in a national park, a tiger expert and a group of hunters turn to an enigmatic local for help when they mysteriously begin to die one by one.

title: Brothers
synopsis: After a troubled past with their alcoholic father, two estranged brothers prepare to face each other again as rivals in a street fighting tournament.

title: Magnificent
synopsis: An industrialist's daughter is forced to marry a rich heir by her greedy grandmother as her adopted sister bonds with the charismatic wedding planner.

title: Gumrah
synopsis: Jailed for drug trafficking while searching for the dad she's never met, a singer gets unlikely support from a crook whose love she has long rejected.

title: Dostana
synopsis: To win over a landlady who only accepts women as tenants, two men pose as a couple – but the jig may be up when they both fall for their flatmate.

title: Duplicate
synopsis: Hilarious mix-ups and deadly encounters ensue when a convict seeks to escape authorities by assuming the identity of his doppelgänger, a perky chef.

title: Agneepath
synopsis: A boy grows up to become a gangster in pursuit of the mobster who killed his innocent father, but revenge and reparation may come at great costs.

title: Muqaddar ka Faisla
synopsis: God-fearing Pandit Krishna Kant loses everything and turns to a life of crime after his landlord tries to rape his wife and tears his family apart.

title: SETHUM AAYIRAM PON
synopsis: Meeting after many years, a makeup artist and her grandmother revisit tensions from an old family feud that still hang heavy between them.

title: A truthful Mother
synopsis: Facing a drought, a hungry tiger and a noble cow have an extraordinary encounter in this fable based on a children’s book and a Kannada folk song.

title: Paharganj
synopsis: In the underbelly of a Delhi neighborhood, a woman’s search for her missing lover collides with drugs, death and a coach grappling with his demons.

title: Through My Father's Eyes: The Ronda Rousey Story
synopsis: This documentary chronicles former Olympian and UFC champion Ronda Rousey's ascent to iconic status in the world of mixed martial arts.

title: Dave Chappelle: The Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize for American Humor
synopsis: Dave Chappelle is awarded the prestigious Mark Twain Prize for American Humor in a star-studded ceremony from the Kennedy Center in Washington, D.C.

title: Kannum Kannum Kollaiyadithaal
synopsis: A carefree racing enthusiast’s womanizing ways end when he meets the girl of his dreams, but their newfound peace is disrupted by a dangerous killer.

title: Rogue Warfare
synopsis: An elite international squad of uniquely skilled special forces is assembled to combat a rising underground terrorist threat in the Middle East.

title: Uncorked
synopsis: A young man feels torn between his dream of becoming a master sommelier and his father’s expectations that he’ll take over the family barbecue business.

title: Maska
synopsis: Determined to make it in showbiz, an aspiring young actor considers turning his back on the beloved Irani café run by his family for generations.

title: Dragons: Rescue Riders: Hunt for the Golden Dragon
synopsis: It's the treasure hunt of a lifetime for the Rescue Riders, who must race to find a precious golden dragon egg and protect it from evil pirates.

title: The Decline
synopsis: An accident at a remote training camp leaves a group of survivalists bitterly divided — and caught in a brutal fight for their lives.

title: True: Wuzzle Wegg Day
synopsis: Spring has sprung in Rainbow City, and Wuzzle Wegg Day is right around the corner! But Bartleby's convinced that a Wegg-stealing monster is on the loose.

title: There's Something in the Water
synopsis: This documentary spotlights the struggle of minority communities in Nova Scotia as they fight officials over the lethal effects of industrial waste.

title: Stunt School
synopsis: An aspiring actress is admitted to a prestigious conservatory but must pay her tuition by working as a performer for an unusual company.

title: Trixie Mattel: Moving Parts
synopsis: Drag queen Trixie Mattel deals with the bittersweet reality of success in this documentary that explores her rise to fame and subsequent music career.

title: Badland
synopsis: A detective with a license to kill roams the Old West to wrangle Confederate war criminals and meets a pioneer woman who throws his journey off track.

title: Making Unorthodox
synopsis: A look at the making of one of the first series to authentically portray and explore issues in a Hasidic community as they pertain to women's lives.

title: Happy Old Year
synopsis: While decluttering her home, a woman’s hefty house renovation leads her back to the past when she uncovers her ex-boyfriend’s belongings.

title: Bethany Hamilton: Unstoppable
synopsis: This documentary follows the rising tide of Bethany Hamilton who lost her arm as a teen before making waves in pro surfing and her personal life.

title: Crip Camp: A Disability Revolution
synopsis: A groundbreaking summer camp galvanizes a group of teens with disabilities to help build a movement, forging a new path toward greater equality.
